00009 #include "TanhFunction.h"
00010 #include <math.h>
00011 
00012 TanhFunction::TanhFunction()
00013 {
00014         offset = 0;
00015         b = 0.5*(offset+1);
00016         width = 1.;
00017         a = log(7.)/width;
00018         calculateOutputScaling();
00019 }
00020 
00021 
00022 TanhFunction::~TanhFunction()
00023 {
00024         ;
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 double TanhFunction::mapValue(double x)
00029 {
00030         return alpha*(tanh(a*(x-b)) - beta);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 JamomaError TanhFunction::setParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00035 {
00036         if (parameterName==gensym("width")) {
00037                 width = atom_getfloat(argv);
00038                 if (width<=0)
00039                         a = log(7.);
00040                 else 
00041                         a = log(7.)/width;
00042                 calculateOutputScaling();
00043                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00044         }
00045         else if (parameterName==gensym("offset")) {
00046                 offset = atom_getfloat(argv);
00047                 b = 0.5*(offset+1);
00048                 calculateOutputScaling();
00049                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00050         }
00051         else    
00052                 return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 JamomaError TanhFunction::getParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00057 {
00058         if (parameterName==gensym("width")) {
00059                 // This memory needs to be freed by the method calling this one
00060                 *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));
00061                 atom_setfloat(*argv, width);
00062                 *argc = 1;
00063                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00064         }
00065         else if (parameterName==gensym("offset")) {
00066                 // This memory needs to be freed by the method calling this one
00067                 *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));
00068                 atom_setfloat(*argv, offset);
00069                 *argc = 1;
00070                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00071         }
00072         else
00073         {       
00074                 *argc = 0;
00075                 return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void TanhFunction::calculateOutputScaling(void)
00080 {
00081         double f0, f1;
00082         
00083         f0=tanh(a*(-b));
00084         f1=tanh(a*(1-b));
00085         // This will never be division by zero, due to the fact that we always have width > 0
00086         alpha = 1/(f1-f0);
00087         beta = f0;
00088 }
00089 
00090 JamomaError TanhFunction::getFunctionParameters(long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00091 {
00092         
00093         int n = *argc = 2;
00094         *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * n);
00095         atom_setsym(*argv, gensym("width")); atom_setsym(*argv+1, gensym("offset"));
00096         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00097         
00098 }
